requirement.title: Host FPGA
requirement.description: The firmware shall be operated on a NG-Large FPGA (ref. NX1H140TSP).

requirement.title: CNES VHDL handbook
requirement.description: The firmware shall be compliant with design and VHDL handbook for VLSI developments, CNES edition, (AD02)

requirement.title: Firmware external reference clock
requirement.description: The firmware shall use an external reference clock with a frequency superior to 100MHz and inferior to 120MHz.
